attributes.action: Ensure British passports are made in the UK
attributes.additional_details: UK passports should be manufactured in the UK.  It's a disgrace that they will be manufactured outside the UK costing UK jobs.  In addition security of passports will be potentially compromised.  A foreign country would not have the same ownership of protection of these blank passports
attributes.background: Please sign this to ensure the UK government reverse the decision to award this contract to a French owned company & keep UK jobs!
